articles.title: Ukrainian rebels to evacuate civilians to Russia amid crisis - Associated Press
articles.description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Separatists in eastern Ukraine announced Friday they are evacuating civilians to Russia, as spiking tensions in the region aggravated Western fears of a Russian invasion of Ukraine and a new war in Europe.
